reviewText: I have seen this movie on Netflix--but it is no longer there.  Wish Amazon would stream it.  Have not ordered it yet---not sure it is in English---although it was when on Netflix.  Have added that question on comments.  Julia is very attractive and a wonderful singer and the songs are very fine---good lyrics as well as tunes.  And, ladies, Keith Baxter is a very handsome leading man--in this 50's when this was made.  And the character he plays makes a wonderful, understated hero.
